patthana9.1:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nahetuṁ
patthana9.1:2.1_1: akusalaṁ abyākataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ. Nahetuṁ
patthana9.1:2.1_2: nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetuṁ nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nahetū
patthana9.1:2.1_3: akusale abyākate khandhe paṭicca hetū. Nahetuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo
patthana9.1:2.1_4: ca nanahetu nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:3.1_0: Nanahetuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:3.1_1: Nanahetuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:3.1_2: Nanahetuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo ca nanahetu nakusalo ca dhammā
patthana9.1:4.1_0: Nahetuṁ nakusalañca nanahetuṁ nakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo dhammo
patthana9.1:4.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ nakusalañca nanahetuṁ nakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana9.1:4.1_2: nanahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ nakusalañca nanahetuṁ nakusalañca
patthana9.1:4.1_3: dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo ca nanahetu nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana9.1:6.1: Nahetuyā dve, na ārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… nakamme tīṇi …pe… naāhāre …pe… namagge ekaṁ …pe… novigate tīṇi.
patthana9.1:8.1_0: Nanahetu nakusalo dhammo nanahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana9.1:8.1_1: Nanahetu nakusalo dhammo nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nanahetu
patthana9.1:8.1_2: nakusalo dhammo nahetussa nakusalassa ca nanahetussa nakusalassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana9.1:9.1: Nahetu nakusalo dhammo nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana9.1:10.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava …pe… upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi …pe… kamme
patthana9.1:10.1_1: tīṇi …pe… āhāre tīṇi …pe… jhāne tīṇi …pe… vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Pañhāvāraṁ
patthana9.1:11.1_0: Nahetuṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nahetuṁ
patthana9.1:11.1_1: kusalaṁ abyākataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana9.1:11.1_2: dve khandhe …pe… nahetuṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati
patthana9.1:11.1_3: hetupaccayā—nahetū kusale abyākate khandhe paṭicca hetū. Nahetuṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana9.1:11.1_4: paṭicca nahetu naakusalo ca nanahetu naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:12.1_0: Nanahetuṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:12.1_1: Nanahetuṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:12.1_2: Nanahetuṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo ca nanahetu naakusalo ca dhammā
patthana9.1:13.1_0: Nahetuṁ naakusalañca nanahetuṁ naakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo
patthana9.1:13.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ naakusalañca nanahetuṁ naakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana9.1:13.1_2: nanahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ naakusalañca nanahetuṁ naakusalañca
patthana9.1:13.1_3: dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo ca nanahetu naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana9.1:15.1_0: Nahetuṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—kusalākusalaṁ
patthana9.1:15.1_1: nahetuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho. Nahetuṁ
patthana9.1:15.1_2: naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ
patthana9.1:15.1_3: naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naabyākato ca nanahetu naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:16.1: Nanahetuṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana9.1:17.1_0: Nahetuṁ naabyākatañca nanahetuṁ naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naabyākato dhammo
patthana9.1:17.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ naabyākatañca nanahetuṁ naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana9.1:17.1_2: nanahetu naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ naabyākatañca nanahetuṁ
patthana9.1:17.1_3: naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naabyākato ca nanahetu naabyākato ca dhammā
